amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a finding to the bill which illustrates the health benefits of EPA's mercury and air toxic cleanup standards for industrial boilers and incinerators.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section which includes findings for health costs and benefits for the rules specified in section 3(b).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 254 (Roll no. 769).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Capps.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 254 (Roll no. 769).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
